verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of David.<WH1732> Hear<WH8085> my prayer,<WH8605> O LORD,<WH3068> give ear<WH238> to<WH413> my supplications:<WH8469> in thy faithfulness<WH530> answer<WH6030> me, and in thy righteousness.<WH6666>
And enter<WH935> not<WH408> into judgment<WH4941> with<WH854> thy servant:<WH5650> for<WH3588> in thy sight<WH6440> shall no<WH3808> man<WH3605> living<WH2416> be justified.<WH6663>

For <WH3588> the enemy<WH341> hath persecuted<WH7291> my soul;<WH5315> he hath smitten<WH1792> my life<WH2416> down to the ground;<WH776> he hath made me to dwell<WH3427> in darkness,<WH4285> as those that have been long<WH5769> dead.<WH4191>
Therefore is my spirit<WH7307> overwhelmed<WH5848> within<WH5921> me; my heart<WH3820> within<WH8432> me is desolate.<WH8074>
I remember<WH2142> the days<WH3117> of old;<WH4480> <WH6924> I meditate<WH1897> on all<WH3605> thy works;<WH6467> I muse<WH7878> on the work<WH4639> of thy hands.<WH3027>
I stretch forth<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> unto thee:<WH413> my soul<WH5315> thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty<WH5889> land.<WH776> Selah.<WH5542>

Hear <WH6030> me speedily,<WH4116> O LORD:<WH3068> my spirit<WH7307> faileth:<WH3615> hide<WH5641> not<WH408> thy face<WH6440> from<WH4480> me, lest I be like<WH4911> unto<WH5973> them that go down<WH3381> into the pit.<WH953>

Cause me to hear<WH8085> thy lovingkindness<WH2617> in the morning;<WH1242> for<WH3588> in thee do I trust:<WH982> cause me to know<WH3045> the way<WH1870> wherein<WH2098> I should walk;<WH1980> for<WH3588> I lift up<WH5375> my soul<WH5315> unto<WH413> thee.
Deliver <WH5337> me, O LORD,<WH3068> from mine enemies:<WH4480> <WH341> I flee unto thee to hide me.<WH3680> <WH413>
Teach <WH3925> me to do<WH6213> thy will;<WH7522> for<WH3588> thou<WH859> art my God:<WH430> thy spirit<WH7307> is good;<WH2896> lead<WH5148> me into the land<WH776> of uprightness.<WH4334>
Quicken <WH2421> me, O LORD,<WH3068> for thy name's sake:<WH4616> <WH8034> for thy righteousness'<WH6666> sake bring my soul out<WH3318> <WH5315> of trouble.<WH4480> <WH6869>
And of thy mercy<WH2617> cut off<WH6789> mine enemies,<WH341> and destroy<WH6> all<WH3605> them that afflict<WH6887> my soul:<WH5315> for<WH3588> I<WH589> am thy servant.<WH5650>
